text: And prepare for them what you were able from strength/power and from the horses`/horsemens` ties/strings/strength , you terrorize/terrify with it God`s enemy, and your enemy, and others from other than them, you do not know them, God knows them, and what you spend from a thing in God`s sake/way is fulfilled/completed to you, and you are not being caused injustice to/oppressed
